RESUME_TIPS: Emphasize experience with **data cleaning and preparation techniques**, elaborating on specific methods used in projects.
Quantify achievements in projects by adding metrics, such as the accuracy of the **age and gender estimation model** and the scale of data processed.
Clearly state your proficiency in **statistical analysis and hypothesis testing**, providing examples where these skills were applied.
Include specific examples of **machine learning algorithms** used in projects to demonstrate practical experience in model building.
Detail your experience with **data visualization tools and techniques**, explicitly mentioning tools like Tableau or Power BI if familiar.
Add a section on **database skills**, explicitly mentioning experience with SQL and any experience with NoSQL databases like MongoDB.
Incorporate keywords related to **data exploration, cleaning, and preparation**, showcasing your ability to handle raw data effectively.
Mention experience with **model deployment and monitoring (MLOps)**, even if it's a basic understanding or personal project.
Highlight any experience with **cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP)** and their associated ML services, demonstrating familiarity with modern data science infrastructure.
Expand on your experience with **big data technologies (e.g., Spark, Hadoop, Hive)**, if applicable, to show scalability skills.

Model Deployment.COURSE_NAME: Machine Learning Engineering for Production (MLOps) Specialization
Model Deployment.DESCRIPTION: This specialization teaches how to deploy, monitor, and maintain machine learning models in production, covering topics like model versioning, CI/CD pipelines, and performance monitoring.
Focuses on practical aspects of deploying and scaling machine learning models in real-world environments, including infrastructure, automation, and best practices for MLOps.
A free, hands-on course that covers the fundamentals of MLOps, including model deployment, monitoring, and automation using modern tools and techniques.
